title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the therapeutic VR environments. Conduct research and gather input from subject matter experts, therapists, and potential users.

title: Architecture and Design for Customizable Virtual Reality Therapeutic Environments
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the VR environment rendering engine, user interface, data management components, and backend services. Define technical specifications, choose appropriate technologies and frameworks (e.g., Unity3D for the rendering engine, ReactJS for the UI, NodeJS and Express for the backend), and outline design principles to ensure scalability, performance, and security. Collaborate with team members to align designs with project requirements. Upon completion, conduct a code review and present the design to the team for feedback and approval.

title: VR Environment Development
description: Implement the virtual reality environments based on the defined requirements and design specifications. This includes creating realistic 3D models, textures, lighting, and interactive elements.

title: User Interface Development
description: Develop the user interface for configuring and customizing the VR environments, as well as any necessary controls or interactions within the VR experience.

title: Data Management and Integration
description: Implement the data management system for storing and retrieving user profiles, session data, and any other relevant information. Integrate with existing systems or databases as needed.

title: Security and Privacy
description: Ensure the system adheres to security and privacy best practices, including data encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., HIPAA).

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing. Ensure the VR environments, user interface, and data management components meet the defined requirements and function as expected.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure and processes for deploying and maintaining the therapeutic VR environments in production. This may include cloud hosting, continuous integration, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for therapists and administrators.
